entry.title: eadmaster/pcrown
entry.summary:
Princess Crown Translation Project Unofficial Redux

Princess Crown Translation (Unofficial) Redux

old readme here

My attempt to continue on the CyberWarriorX translation project.

P.N.: reportedly CyberWarriorX and SamIAm are still working privately on this project, and since this was forked many years ago it does not reflect the current status of their project. Btw since this was originally released with a GPL-2.0 license, i'd like to exercise my right to keep working on this and make improvements as long as a better translation patch is released.

Current status

  • all story events and names translated using a fixed-width font
  • missing items translations
  • missing translation for location signs
  • needs play testing for bugs

FAQs

use a VWF (Variable Width Font)?

That would require a lot of code changes, not top priority atm.

PSP port?

not top priority atm.

Found a bug?

Please report game-breaking bugs (like soft-locks) while providing a savegame and instructions to reproduce.

Most bugs related to text dialogs were already reported and are known.

Preview

Semi-automated patch instructions

  1. obtain a game image matching these hashes, and extract it
  2. download and execute one of these easy patching scripts in the extraction dir:
  • for Windows
  • for Linux

Manual patch instructions

  1. obtain a game image matching these hashes, and extract it
  2. grab the latest xdelta patch from the Releases section.
  3. download and install iat and xdelta3
  4. convert track 1 to iso with iat -i "Princess Crown (Japan) (1M) (Track 01).bin" -o "Princess Crown (Japan) (1M) (Track 01).iso" --iso
  5. apply the xdelta patch with xdelta3 -d -s "Princess Crown (Japan) (1M) (Track 01).iso" "Princess.Crown.Japan.1M.Track.01.iso.xdelta" "Princess Crown (Japan) (1M) (Track 01) (English).iso"
  6. use this cue sheet to play with the patched iso.

Contributions

Issues and PRs are currently restricted to contributors to avoid spamming, trolling, etc.

Contact me via discord or forums if you can contribute or have issues to report:

  • https://discord.com/channels/348545631985467394/797608417857372161
  • https://segaxtreme.net/members/eadmaster.30323/
  • https://gbatemp.net/members/eadmaster.52646/

New contributors

Not already listed in the old readme:

  • paul-met and derek (short spaces and dialog fixes)
  • Spike and MLagaffe (bug reports)
  • MiYakuGaming (missing translation parts)
